header.title: CosEventChannelAdmin_ConsumerAdmin

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements a ConsumerAdmin interface, which allows consumers to be connected to the event channel.

description.p: The ConsumerAdmin interface defines the first step for connecting consumers to the event channel. It acts as a factory for creating proxy suppliers. Both consumer administration and supplier administration are defined as separate objects so that the creator of the channel can control the addition of suppliers and consumers.

To get access to all definitions include necessary hrl files by using:
-include_lib("cosEvent/include/*.hrl").

desc.p: This operation returns a ProxyPushSupplier object reference.
This operation returns a ProxyPullSupplier object reference.
